quest.name: Dwalls Task Part I
quest.subtitle: Go kill some zombies
quest.description:
Go and find 5 zombies.

Kill those zombies.
And don't get bitten!
quest.offer: The Quest is Simple. Go out into the world and bring down 5 zombies. Doing so will help Dwalls Army gain ground for the war of the walkers. Accept and go fight for Dwalls Army.\n\nDwall

quest.name: Dwalls Task Part II
quest.subtitle: Time to grab some meat
quest.description: Sense you completed you first task, you are granted another.\nThis time its about food.\nGo out and hunt some wildlife.
quest.offer:
Good Job on those zombie kills.
The War of the Walkers is going to be a long fight with no end in sight. This is why you should go and gather some food.
Gather some meat from some wildlife, any will do.

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Task Part III
quest.subtitle: Now to cook your meat
quest.description: The third task is simple. You must now cook your raw meat you harvested from those animals. Cook yourself some meat. You will need the energy
quest.offer:
Nice hunting. Now that you got some raw meat you should cook it up.
Be careful and zombies can smell that stuff from a distance, watch your back
Cook that meat up

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Task Part IV
quest.subtitle: Time to melee some zombies
quest.description: With this 4th task ahead of you its time to test your strength. You may not have the luck to have firearms on you when facing a walker. So lets test your melee skills with a Iron Reinforced Club.\n\Simply Craft a Iron Reinforced Club and bash in some zombie heads!
quest.offer:
Now that you got energy, Lets use some of that with some melee kills.
Craft a Iron Reinforced Club and kill 1 of each regular zombie.
You are close to end, Stay in there!

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Task Part IV
quest.subtitle: Time to melee some zombies
quest.description: With this 4th task ahead of you its time to test your strength. You may not have the luck to have firearms on you when facing a walker. So lets test your melee skills with a Iron Reinforced Club.\n\Simply Craft a Iron Reinforced Club and bash in some zombie heads!
quest.offer:
Now that you got energy, Lets use some of that with some melee kills.
Craft a Iron Reinforced Club and kill 1 of each regular zombie.
You are close to end, Stay in there!

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Task Part V
quest.subtitle: Lets Hunt Some Zombies
quest.description: Last of my tasks for you. Go kill 1 of each zombie and you shall be rewarded!
quest.offer:
Last of all, now that you got some basic skills, lets put them to use. Go and kill one of each zombie.
Once this is done you will be rewarded!

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 1 Part 1 of 5
quest.subtitle: Craft a Pistol and Some Ammo
quest.offer: Here is the First of Dwalls Quests\nYou start by fetching a Pistol and crafting some 9mm Bullets
quest.description:
Go and gather and craft all the materials needed to assemble a pistol and craft some 9mm Bullet Ammunition
Good Luck

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 1 Part 2 of 5
quest.subtitle: Kill Some Zombies With Your Pistol
quest.offer: Now with that fine new pistol you crafted and you got the ammunition for it. Lets Test it out on some moving objects :)
quest.description:
Now with your pistol you made earlier on lets go out and kill stuff.
With your pistol equiped go out and kill some zombies or wildlife, any will do
consider this your training soldier. The War of the Walkers is not a friendly place to be in

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 1 Part 3 of 5
quest.subtitle: Craft Some Leather Armor
quest.offer: Nice Kills, Now lets get some armor crafted.\nThose old plant fibre clothing you had before aren't that great. Time for some upgrades. Lets Craft some Leather Armor
quest.description:
Armor is essential part of survival. Just like food, water, and shelter. Armor can be the difference between life and death.
Craft some leather from some Animal Hide and turn that into some leather armor!

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 1 Part 4 of 5
quest.subtitle: Base Building
quest.offer: Thats better, that armor should keep you a little bit safer and a bit warmer.\nNow it's time to think about where you will be resting tonight. Lets build a little shack with some wood.
quest.description:
It's time to build a shelter for you to rest and store your gear. Lets start by building a Base. Walls, Windows and a Door. Don't forget the Roof!
After that craft a Storage Crate and place that in your shack

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 1 Part 5 of 5
quest.subtitle: Base Defenses
quest.offer: Nice Shack! Now you should craft some Defenses. Just build some wood log spikes and spikes. Then through in some land mines for some fun
quest.description:
Your walls won't hold off those zombies for too long. Its best if you build some defenses to slow those buggers down.
Craft some Log Spikes and some Wood Log Spikes. Next would be to craft some Scrap Iron Mines, Just be careful not to walk over them after placing them. :)

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 1 of 4
quest.subtitle: Assemble a Hunting Rifle and Craft Some Ammo
quest.offer: Hey Champ! Got a Quest Series here for you. By the end of this you will be greatly rewarded.\n\Start off with fetching a Hunting Rifle and Crafting some Ammunition
quest.description:
War of the Walkers isn't a place for weak folk. By the end of these quests you should have enough training to survive well on your own. So pay attention and learn
\First off your going to have to assemble a Hunting Rifle, Hunting isn't going to be easy with out it. But whats a gun without ammunition...Which is why you will also have to craft some 32mm Bullets Good Luck

Dwall

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 2 of 4
quest.subtitle: Hunting, Armor Crafting, and Some Cooking
quest.offer:
Nice Rifle, don't loose it like your clothing when we found you.
\Now lets test your hunting skills and go kill 1 of each animal. Then lets craft some hide armor to keep you warm during cold dark nights, your not going to get much comfort from anyone else. After that hunting your going to have some meat so lets make something out of it

Dwall
quest.description: With your Hunting Rifle go out and track down 1 of each animal and harvest their corpses for Raw Meat and Animal Hide. With that animal hide, craft some Animal Hide Armor. Hide Armor will keep you warm in cold weather, not the greatest but its descent. While out and hunting look for some birds nest to find some eggs, with that and the meat you get from your hunt you can cook up some good ol' Bacon and Eggs!

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 2 of 4
quest.subtitle: Hunting, Armor Crafting, and Some Cooking
quest.offer:
Nice Rifle, don't loose it like your clothing when we found you.
\Now lets test your hunting skills and go kill 1 of each animal. Then lets craft some hide armor to keep you warm during cold dark nights, your not going to get much comfort from anyone else. After that hunting your going to have some meat so lets make something out of it

Dwall
quest.description: With your Hunting Rifle go out and track down 1 of each animal and harvest their corpses for Raw Meat and Animal Hide. With that animal hide, craft some Animal Hide Armor. Hide Armor will keep you warm in cold weather, not the greatest but its descent. While out and hunting look for some birds nest to find some eggs, with that and the meat you get from your hunt you can cook up some good ol' Bacon and Eggs!

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 2 of 4
quest.subtitle: Hunting, Armor Crafting, and Some Cooking
quest.offer:
Nice Rifle, don't loose it like your clothing when we found you.
\Now lets test your hunting skills and go kill 1 of each animal. Then lets craft some hide armor to keep you warm during cold dark nights, your not going to get much comfort from anyone else. After that hunting your going to have some meat so lets make something out of it

Dwall
quest.description: With your Hunting Rifle go out and track down 1 of each animal and harvest their corpses for Raw Meat and Animal Hide. With that animal hide, craft some Animal Hide Armor. Hide Armor will keep you warm in cold weather, not the greatest but its descent. While out and hunting look for some birds nest to find some eggs, with that and the meat you get from your hunt you can cook up some good ol' Bacon and Eggs!

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 3 of 4
quest.subtitle: First Aid Supplies
quest.offer:
Now your looking fancy, but next time maybe take more care when cutting that hide.
\Now lets make sure you have some descent first aid supplies. You know bandages, pills etc. Those always come in handy, almost use them as much as taking your Vitamin D!

Dwall
quest.description: With any survival first aid is a requirement. You will not survive long without it, well at least now a days. This is why you must stock up on your basic Bandages, your First Aid Bandages, some antibiotics, and some splints. You break your leg you don't want to wait until you make one of those. Faster you can heal yourself the better.

quest.name: Dwalls Quest 2 Part 4 of 4
quest.subtitle: Killing Spree
quest.offer:
Now that you got a good supply of first aid, weapons, ammo, food and armor. It's time you put all of that to use. And what better way in doing so than taking out all your rage on some walkers! All you got to do is Kill Kill and maybe Kill some more.
\You will be rewarded by the end of this, if you survive...

Dwall
quest.description: Time to do some killing..Well I mean a little more..Nevermind a hole fuck ton more. This part of the quest isn't that hard to figure out, its more about killing things. So have fun, good luck and don't die!\n\Kill all of these zombies and you shall be granted a just reward!

quest.name: Mushroom Stew Chef
quest.subtitle: Cook some Mushroom Stew
quest.offer: Gather the materials needed and craft 5 Mushroom Stew.\n\nDwall
quest.description:
Gather these items:
5 Bottled Water
5 Raw Meat
10 Potatoes
10 Mushrooms

With those ingredients cook up 5 Mushroom Stews.

quest.subtitle: Cook some Meat Stew
quest.offer: Gather the materials needed and craft 5 Meat Stews.\n\nDwall
quest.description:

5 Corn
5 Bottled Water

5 Eggs

quest.description: Go and kill some Professional Business Zombies.

quest.name: Dwalls Lost Goods
quest.subtitle: Dwalls Lost Goods
quest.offer: Dwall here, I am leaving this not here hoping that one day someone will find this. That day has come apparantly, unless zombies can read. Attached is a map to some hidden treasure I left burried just in case I needed them later on. I don't, so as far as I can tell, you are most deserving. Good Luck\n\nDwall
quest.description: Locate the treasure. Toggle active on map to mark on your compass.

quest.name: Missing Health Supplies
quest.subtitle: Health Supplies Gone Missing
quest.offer: Attached is a map to the last known where abouts of the missing Health Supplies. Find it and its yours!\n\nDwall
quest.description: Missing Medical Supplies. Attached is a map of its last known spotting. Good Luck

quest.name: Lighting up the Night
quest.subtitle: lighting up the night
quest.offer: Gather the materials needed and craft some Lighting Fixtures.\n\nOzzylynn
quest.description:
Gather these items:
60 Forged Iron
130 Electric Parts
30 Electronic Parts
10 Scrap Plastics
With those materials craft some industrial lights.

quest.name: Protecting the fort
quest.subtitle: Protecting the fort
quest.offer: Gather the materials needed and craft switches, Speakers, Pressure plates and Motion sensors.\n\nOzzylynn
quest.description:
Gather these items:
180 Forged Iron
80 Electric Parts
40 Electronic Parts
40 Mechanical Parts
With those materials craft some Trigger Type Traps.

quest.name: Protecting the fort 2.0
quest.subtitle: Protecting the fort 2.0
quest.offer: Gather the materials needed and craft SpeedTraps, Explosive Speed Traps and Fire Speed Traps.\n\nOzzylynn
quest.description:
Gather these items:
300 Forged Iron
30 Barbed Wire Sheets
30 Glue
100 Gun Powder
100 Gas Can
50 Tallow
With those materials craft some Speed Traps.
